data.description: A Class 1 Client For The IDentity Protocol
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The IDentity protocol is a new system being developed on
    sourceforge.net It aims to provide a 'single sign-on' service for
    all applications. Everything from web pages, to operating system
    login screens to eventually door locks. One of the project goals is
    to provide users control over their information to counter
    Microsoft's Passport system under which Microsoft controls
    everything.

    The proposed Net::ID module would be the perl implementation of
    this new protocol. This will allow perl software (web pages,
    scripts, etc...) to use the IDentity protocol.
